alert.note: Alert for Ashe; Watauga (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:53PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm has developed over Fleetwood in southeast Ashe county and will impact portions southeastern Ashe and extreme northeastern Watauga counties through 615 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fleetwood, or near Deep Gap. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. Locally heavy rainfall. Cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Jefferson... Deep Gap... Todd... Fleetwood... Baldwin... Idlewild... and Othello. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
